channel.description: Recent content in tool on instantiator.dev

item.title: Open Social Distributor
item.description: How to use Open Social Distributor to post threads and messages across multiple social networks at once.

item.title: Reveal in React
item.description: What if your UI was a slide show? Reveal in React TLDR: Here’s a template repository for a NextJS app with a Reveal slide show UI: instantiator/reveal-on-next

item.title: Exploring OAuth
item.description: OAuth Token Explorer is a tool to explore authentication and authorisation on behalf of a user.

item.title: Hammering JSON into CSV
item.description: json-to-smart-csv is a tool to help build CSV records from arbitrary JSON…

item.title: Your own map server
item.description: A quick guide to running your own tile server, with a geo database populated from OpenStreetMap data.

item.title: 3D puzzle print: a crossword generation tool
item.description: A tool to design 3D printed crossword puzzles. Generating 3D crossword models I’ve been working on a tool to generate crossword designs using OpenSCAD.

item.title: The rocketship template ðŸš€
item.description: Presenting a simple template to develop, publish, and test a simple C# service backend on AWS, with serverless Lambda functions, supported by DynamoDb, behind an API Gateway, and protected by Cognito auth.

item.title: International Consensus Chess is in public beta!
item.description: Consensus Chess is going through some beta testing on Mastodon, and you can play today!

item.title: A template thesis to simplify your write-up
item.description: The things I’ll do to avoid learning LaTeX… Do you prefer Markdown to LaTeX?

item.title: Querying data files with terminal tools
item.description: There are a many ways to peek inside a data file and reason about its contents.

item.title: Keeping jobs alive with caffeine
item.description: My Mac likes to go to sleep to save power, and that means any long-running processes I have underway will be suspended when it does.

item.title: Drive Stamper
item.description: This is a necropost, resurrected from an old blog. Drive Stamper Drive Stamper is one of the first projects I released into the wild, and helped me to kick off my old blog in 2011.
